sourcesContent:
import { useContext, useState } from 'react' import { MailIcon, PhoneIcon, TrashIcon, PencilIcon, } from '@heroicons/react/solid' import ContactContext from '../Context/Contact/contactContext' const ContactItem = ({ contact }) => { const contactContext = useContext(ContactContext) const { deleteContact, setCurrent, clearCurrent } = contactContext const { id, name, email, phone, type, photo, dob, bloodGroup } = contact const [isExpanded, setIsExpanded] = useState(false) const onDelete = () => { deleteContact(id) clearCurrent() } const toggleExpand = () => setIsExpanded(!isExpanded) return (

  • {name}

    {type.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + type.slice(1)}

    {email}

    {isExpanded && (

    Phone: {phone}

    Email: {email}

    Date of Birth: {dob || 'N/A'}

    Blood Group: {bloodGroup || 'N/A'}

    )}
    Email Call
    setCurrent(contact)} >
) } export default ContactItem
